key.name: notifications-enabled
key.description: If enabled, notifications will show up on in various scenarios (when the GPU mode, power profile or charging limit is changed. Those notifications are not only triggered by the extension itself but react on DBUS signals from asusd, supergfxd and power-profiles-daemon.

key.name: debug-enabled
key.description: If enabled, various events of the extension will get logged and are available via journalctl.
